org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.opt
Interface Simulation2

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSimulation2, EfficientSimulation2, NaiveSimulation2, RefinedSimulation2, SchematicSimulation2
public interface Simulation2

This interface defines the direct simulation between two automata.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

Method Summary
 void computeDirectSimulationRelation()
          Computes the direct simulation relation.
 void computeReverseSimulationRelation()
          Computes the reverse simulation relation.
 boolean isDirectSimulated(State s1, State s2)
          Returns true if a state in the first automaton can be directly simulated by another state in the second automaton.
 boolean isReverseSimulated(State s1, State s2)
          Returns true if a state in the first automaton can be reversely simulated by another state in the second automaton.
 boolean isSimulated()
          Returns true if the first automaton is simulated by the second automaton.
 

Method Detail

isDirectSimulated

boolean isDirectSimulated(State s1,
                          State s2)
Returns true if a state in the first automaton can be directly simulated by another state in the second automaton. This method should be invoked after computeDirectSimulationRelation()

Parameters:
s1 - a state in the first automaton
s2 - a state in the second automaton
Returns:
true if s1 can be directly simulated by s2

isReverseSimulated

boolean isReverseSimulated(State s1,
                           State s2)
Returns true if a state in the first automaton can be reversely simulated by another state in the second automaton. This method should be invoked after computeReverseSimulationRelation()

Parameters:
s1 - a state in the first automaton
s2 - a state in the second automaton
Returns:
true if s1 can be reversely simulated by s2

isSimulated

boolean isSimulated()
Returns true if the first automaton is simulated by the second automaton. This method should be invoked after computeDirectSimulationRelation().

Returns:
true if the first automaton is simulated by the second automaton

computeDirectSimulationRelation

void computeDirectSimulationRelation()
Computes the direct simulation relation.

computeReverseSimulationRelation

void computeReverseSimulationRelation()
Computes the reverse simulation relation.
